pathAssistantSteps.info:
Congratulations! Your opportunity is now Closed-Won.


Forecast Guidance

Closed

1. Identify and fill in the Account Name (sold-to), Ultimate Consignee (UC) and Distributor

2. If Illumina is selling directly to the UC, please select the checkbox labeled "Direct Sale to Ultimate Consignee"

3. Add at least one Contact to the Opportunity and assign Role (Contact Roles in Related Tab)

4. Enter all key fields (see key fields)

5. Identify and enter all segmentation criteria (see Segmentation Information section)

Note: Opportunity cannot move into next stage until accepted


Account (Sold-To) – 与最终用户买卖的代理商

代理商与最终用户之间的交易模式：人民币→此处填境内注册的代理商；美金→此处填境外注册的代理商

Ultimate Consignee (end customer) – 最终用户

Distributor – 签DA的代理商


Reminders

For prospect account (Sold-To or Ultimate Consignee), obtain ERP ID prior to quoting; request account validation/upgrade once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request)


Forecast Guidance

Default: Not Forecasted

Objective of this stage is to position the Illumina Solution and communicate the competitive landscape. Must Complete to Move to Next Stage:

1. Complete the competitive landscape field.

2. Indicate Competitor name (see key fields).


Reminders

- Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed

- Identify Primary Contact prior to generating Quote (Contact Roles in Related Tab)

- If Prospect, obtain ERP ID prior to quoting; request account validation/upgrade once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request)


Forecast Guidance:

Default: Not Forecasted

Reminders

- Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed

- Purchase Order Number and Date will be auto-populated once received, and opportunity will close automatically.


Forecast Guidance

Default: Commit

Objective of this stage is to reach mutual agreement. Must Complete to Move to Next Stage:


1. Complete Win Strategy and enter the Competitor's name

2. If needed, please upgrade prospect account and enter a date on the "Customer Account Creation Requested On" once the request is sent. Please reach out to your Partner Account Manager for assistance to complete this requirement. Accounts must be upgraded to Ultimate Consignee or Sold-To depending on scenario.


Reminders

- Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed

- If Prospect, request Customer account creation (Account Object, Master Data Request)


Forecast Guidance

Default: Commit

1. Identify Primary contact (receives Quote) ("Contact Roles" in Related Tab)

2. Use the "Quote Request" tab when you need a quote proposal (In Activity panel, change the assignee if needed)

3. Enter Rev Rec Terms information to reflect revenue recognition details for this opportunity. Must be completed by PAM/TAM.


For manual quotes

Provide manual Quote number and reason (Quote & Order section) and fill out the "Quote Generated on" date field.


Reminders

- Update Close Date and/or Forecast Category, if needed

- If Prospect, request Customer account creation once ready (Account Object, Master Data Request) 



Forecast Guidance

Default: Upside

Objective of this stage is to confirm buying need. Must Complete to Move to Next Stage:

1. Identify contact with Main Contact role for this opportunity (Contact Roles in Related Tab)

2. Add products to the opportunity

3. If Illumina is selling directly to the Ultimate Consignee, please select the checkbox labeled "Direct Sale to Ultimate Consignee".

Account (Sold-To) – 与最终用户买卖的代理商

代理商与最终用户之间的交易模式：人民币→此处填境内注册的代理商；美金→此处填境外注册的代理商

Ultimate Consignee (end customer) – 最终用户

Distributor – 签DA的代理商


Reminders

– Update Close Date and / or Forecast Category, if needed.

– Identify Primary Contact prior to generating Quote (Contact Roles in Related Tab)

– If prospect account, obtain ERP ID prior to quoting; request account validation/upgrade once ready (Account Object,Master Data Request)


Forecast Guidance:

Default: Not Forecasted
